name: R&D Arts
overview: We are applied R&D organization that helps in developing IP. We have tremendous expertise in Mobile and Enterprise Software Development. We specialize in newest and coolest areas of Software Development, such as Mobile Multimedia (Media Streaming, Capturing and Delivery), Augmented and Virtual Reality, and Computer Vision. We would be able to help your organization the areas that require unique expertise, adjacent or external domain knowledge, particular platforms and frameworks. We would be good help when here is a need in new solutions and applications, especially for smartphones, tablets, portable and specialized electronics. We would be able to bring algorithms, methods and solutions to many applied math and computer science problems.
